South Lyon, MI 48178

citations.narrative:
Three goats, six sheep, and three alpacas were sold a week ago. The licensee does not have the address of the person
she sold the animals to. Not having all required disposition information documented doesn't allow for APHIS officials to
properly track the animals going through the facility. Correct starting on 8/6/25.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee was unable to find the acquisition records for the animals on hand. Not being able to find all the required
documents (including all acquisition records) during inspection doesn't allow for APHIS officials to properly track the
animals moving through the facility. The licensee must find and produce all required documents at the next inspection. If
the required documents can't be found, then the licensee must create new acquisition records showing where all the
regulated animals have come from. Correct by 9/6/25.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, an environmental enhancement plan for birds that documents the appropriate provisions to
provide enrichment and special considerations that is approved by the attending veterinarian has not been developed by
the facility. This plan is necessary to ensure the psychological well-being and health of the animals. The facility must
ensure that a documented plan for environmental enhancement that addresses the required elements including social
grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, and exemptions is approved by the attending veterinarian as
well as maintained and available for inspection. Correct by 9/6/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(iv) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Three goats, six sheep, and three alpacas were sold a week ago. The licensee does not have the address of the person 
she sold the animals to. Not having all required disposition information documented doesn't allow for APHIS officials to 
properly track the animals going through the facility. Correct starting on 8/6/25. 
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The licensee was unable to find the acquisition records for the animals on hand. Not being able to find all the required 
documents (including all acquisition records) during inspection doesn't allow for APHIS officials to properly track the 
animals moving through the facility. The licensee must find and produce all required documents at the next inspection. If 
the required documents can't be found, then the licensee must create new acquisition records showing where all the 
regulated animals have come from. Correct by 9/6/25. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
At the time of inspection, an environmental enhancement plan for birds that documents the appropriate provisions to 
provide enrichment and special considerations that is approved by the attending veterinarian has not been developed by 
the facility. This plan is necessary to ensure the psychological well-being and health of the animals. The facility must 
ensure that a documented plan for environmental enhancement that addresses the required elements including social 
grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, and exemptions is approved by the attending veterinarian as 
well as maintained and available for inspection. Correct by 9/6/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report.
